definition: spend time at a lower socio-economic level than one's own, motivated by curiosity or desire for adventure; usage considered condescending and insensitive; "attending a motion picture show by the upper class was considered sluming in the early 20th century"
subject: verb.social

por: visitar uma favela ou bairro pobre
tha: เยี่ยมชมชุมชนแออัด
